src.UI

Class HUDLayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • src.UI.HUDLayer

  • public class HUDLayer
extends java.lang.Object
    Keep track of all of the Heads-Up-Display elements that could be displayed on the screen.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      HUDLayer(Map map)
      Initialise a new HUDLayer object and use the given map to set the minimap
